attributes.title: bad app 🤢
attributes.review: Honestly the worst app that i have ever gotten. 10/10 would not recommend to anyone that has a competent brain. After having it for a few days, my brain started to ooze strange orange liquids from my ears and it was causing episodes where I would go outside shouting fascist propaganda. If you want to keep your morals and democracy alive, do NOT get this app. If you do please review it and warn everyone else how bad it is. 🙅🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Worst app on Apple store
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever came across. It took me to a sex trafficking website told me to put my information my family’s information , Social Security number, my family Social Security number and it not only that but after I downloaded this app I started getting followed by a black SUV. They followed me all the way to my house I was scared for my life what in the world is with this app?!?!?

attributes.title: Teddy Duncan
attributes.review: This app is horrible! 😾 It took 5 hours to download!! And when I opened the app it started glitching my phone! I tired to delete it but it wouldn’t let me as if my phone was hacked! 😤 I let my phone cool down and went for a swim outside in my pool and when I came back to check on my phone once I unlocked it Good Luck Charlie was playing?!? Teddy Duncan was singing on stage in this horrible outfit! What is this app?!? Disgusting.

attributes.title: THIS APP BITES THE DUST!!!
attributes.review:
Me waiting for this app to download like 👁👄👁. This app took about a MONTH to download!!!!!! I never took my eyes off the screen! I didn’t eat or drink ANYTHING! My mom would come into my room and I would HISS at her!!! This app turned me into a monster😈 I love taking after my president. He would be proud of me hehehhehe. so what if I’m the MONSTARRR... who’s been here all along
😋 
Also there is nothing about Barron on this app. Total and utter disappointment, smh 🤦🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app and I began to have visions in which the world was burning and civilization crumbling as we knew it. Atop a large tower bathed in blood stood an orange man, speaking into a microphone saying, “What apocalypse? Everything is fine, America is fine. America is strong and the economy is great.” As the sound of screaming filled the room, he waved off the female reporter.
Also it glitched a lot and had a lot of content supporting the abuse and murder of minorities across the country.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: WARNING: using this app will make you incredibly racist, homophobic, xenophobic, transphobic, misogynistic, as well as many other side effects. Downloading the app may also lead to skin turning a sickly orange in color. As a white mother of eight, believe me when I say this is an awful app. My children have now begun to look like Oompaloompas rather than the Hitlers wet dream. I am mortified and disappointed. The only people who would enjoy this app are sheep. WAKE UP SHEEPLE!!!

attributes.title: Problematic
attributes.review: This app gave me many problems to the point I’m not even gonna leave a star if that’s possible. It’s glitchy and sends out FALSE information!!! On top of that is homophobic, sexist and racist!!! It’s a huge mess and I don’t recommend! I demand for the Apple store to take down this horrid app! For heaven sakes my son had gotten the app and a very inappropriate add played on his tablet! I hope Apple sees the problem with this and addresses it!

attributes.title: Black lives matter😽
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. I wanted to get it to support the orange fake spray tan god like president we have currently who doesn’t care about our country and is gross, but when i downloaded it it automatically asked for my permission to harass me through my phone mumber😭 i felt really unsafe and this app is not good at all. it always glitches and shouldn’t even bother being in the app store.

attributes.title: absolutely horrific🧚‍♂️✨-sofia the first
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see the famous orange 🍊 person who is a rapist and racist who wants to ban an app because he got upset ☹️this app made me sick to my stomach and made my phone glitch for hours and hours and not to mention it took a YEAR TO DOWNLOAD it’s unbelievable. Hope that anyone who downloaded this app feels better 😌 and for those who are gonna vote for the orange looking man🍊...well good luck charlie 🧚‍♂️✨🥰

attributes.title: Gave my smart phone a virus
attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app my phone completely shut off and will not turn on for up to three hours. I had to connect my phone to the computer to get it rebooted. I lost all of my storage and information that was preexisting on my device. Whoever created this app is a piece of work. I strongly encourage you not to download or support this app. Thanks have a lovely day!
